Package me.night.midnight.midnight_bot.autoreply

Interface AutomatedResponse

All Known Implementing Classes:
AutomatedResponseImpl, SimpleAutoReply
public interface AutomatedResponse

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean checkConditions​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message msg)
    Checks to see if the message matches this AutomatedResponse's conditions
    java.lang.String getResponse()
    Returns a response to the message
    default void run​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message msg, boolean useReply)
    Sends a response message to a text channel

  • Method Details

    • checkConditions

      boolean checkConditions​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message msg)
      Checks to see if the message matches this AutomatedResponse's conditions
      Returns:
      Whether or not the message matches this response

    • getResponse

      java.lang.String getResponse()
      Returns a response to the message
      Returns:
      The response to send

    • run

      default void run​(net.dv8tion.jda.api.entities.Message msg, boolean useReply)
      Sends a response message to a text channel
      Parameters:
      msg - The message to respond to
      useReply - Whether or not to send the message as a reply
